title: Gelibol
content:
Gelibol (nebo Ghelibol) je region v Redanii. Leží na Nimnarské řece, a branch Buiny, which forms the border between Redania and the Liga Hengfors. Gelibol lies at the foot of the Poštolčí hory. It is also the site of a temple of Coram Agh Tera at the Mirt keep.

Města a hrady
Gelibol, main city
Mirt
